Review_1:
First- location of property was 6km away from Manali in village near to solang, peaceful location, good to relax in Hills, away from mall road crowd. We got heavy snowfall as compared to Manali, fresh Pure White snow.
Second- Hotel was good, staff was very cooperative, food quality was not up to the mark as compared to the price, we used to eat nearby cafe's and restaurants. Rooms was spacious with beautiful view but not so much clean. Hotel staff was very helpful.

Review_1:
Really enjoyed the stay and following are observations
Pros: Big property
Good view, nice staff. They are conducting one event in evening like DJ, Bonfire etc..we enjoyed it teally well. Awesome breakfast
Cons: the road to property is very bad. Room service is bit delay
Lot of place to walk around and play. DJ games bonfire etc..
Review_2: It was a nice experience staying at Sterling Fernhill Ooty. It is a huge property with a lot of rooms. We could walk around the property and the walk was pleasant. The rooms we stayed were classic rooms. They were clean and spacious. However, the stay would have been amazing if they had provided tootbrush and paste kits included in the toiletries and a foot mat outside the bathroom, which many hotels of sterling standard provide nowadays. Moreover, the food was not great. Breakfast was great though. The staff was courteous and the weather was amazing which made our stay lovely!

Review_1: Hey, stayed at Temple Tree for around 2 days. here is my experience. After 11:30 PM no service guy is available nothing no contact if we need anything in middle of the night. Grab is best option available, very very fast and reliable service by Grab.
